Sunday.name: Karpatka
Sunday.description: Experience the taste of Poland with our creamy and luscious Karpatka, a dessert that's as rich in tradition as it is in flavor.

Monday.name: Pirozhki
Monday.description: These Russian hand pies are a savory delight, filled with a variety of delicious fillings and wrapped in a flaky pastry shell.

Tuesday.name: Basbousa
Tuesday.description: Savor the sweetness of the Middle East with Basbousa, a delectable semolina cake soaked in fragrant syrup and garnished with almonds.

Wednesday.name: Povitica
Wednesday.description: Delight in the artistry of our Povitica, a beautifully swirled Eastern European pastry filled with layers of irresistible goodness.

Thursday.name: Lamington
Thursday.description: Taste the essence of Australia with our Lamington, a sponge cake square coated in chocolate icing and desiccated coconut.

Friday.name: Sachertorte
Friday.description: Indulge in the legendary Sachertorte, a sumptuous Austrian chocolate cake layered with apricot jam and covered in glossy chocolate glaze.

Saturday.name: Baklava
Saturday.description: ravel to the Mediterranean with our Baklava, a sweet and nutty pastry masterpiece that's a true delight for the senses.
